thread.title: M Claudia

author: M Claudia
title: M Claudia
text:
I got the 1500mg cbd-cbda oil and im still taking my time to use it, as my first concern was not to mix it with my other medicines, mainly natural extract, but not knowing how one affects the other has stopped me from using it on daily basis as I intended.I will update my review soon.
One question though, is it possible to vape this oil using an ecigarette kit ? I wanted to mix it with an vegetable glicerin eliquid for vaping, but not sure if is good or harmfull for the lungs?!?!
Best regards!
